rows.label: qev085101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ah, look who's here—perfect timing.
Turns out I've got a mission that's right up your alley.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085101_MSG0003
rows.name:
See? You're perfect for it.
Now then, remember the night the Ganglion hit us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085101_MSG0004
rows.name: Your team took on a pair of xenos—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085101_MSG0004_2
rows.name:
real bad apples.
A big ol' lug and one nasty little lady.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085101_MSG0005
rows.name: Dagahn and Ryyz, I think it was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085101_MSG0008
rows.name:
We just got word they've been spotted
skulking around Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085101_MSG0009
rows.name: Could they be planning another attack?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085101_MSG0010
rows.name:
That, or who knows what. Whatever they're up to,
I can tell ya—it ain't gonna be good for us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Muscle Man not worry his mustache hairs gray.
Team Tatsu is on the case![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085101_MSG0012
rows.name: Right. Those two are no pushovers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085101_MSG0012_2
rows.name:
We fought them once, and we beat them once—
we're the best choice to take this on.[ST:wait ]
